message.content:
cs.NI, cs.DC, cs.SY, cs.IT, cs.LG 

This paper deals with the optimization of energy consumption in a fog computing network, which involves resource allocation and offloading decisions. This topic is closely related to computer networks (cs.NI), distributed computing (cs.DC), control systems (cs.SY), information theory (cs.IT), and machine learning (cs.LG) as the authors propose a distributed framework that leverages the unique structure of the problem and parallel processing at fog nodes.
